entry.title: Hello World!
entry.content:
Hi there and welcome to my virgin post. Please be gentle, we don't want to have bad memories this time.

I'm a Berlin based 20-something guy that is into computer science. I speak quite a few programming languages and focus on building stable, fault-tolerant, and distributed systems. I'm also having interests in different areas of machine learning especially deep learing. 

Besides technology I like things like photography, hiking, volleyball and lots of outdoorsy activities. You may see posts that include these kind of things as well in the future.

Have a good one for now.

Cheers,
Chris
